title: Breaking down the question
text: Recollect the method to calculate uncertainty with multiplication

title: Sub-questions
text: What is the area based on the actual lengths, 3.955 and 3.050? (Round to three decimal places)

title: Sub-questions
text: Calculate the total uncertainty for the final answer? (Hint: Remember you need to sum all the percentage uncertainties with respect to each length) Round to two decimal places - (0.005/3.955 * 0.005/3.050) * 12.06275
